resources.string: See a doctor regularly as a preventive measure rather than reactively.
Eat 2-3 Meals within 6-8 hours per day.
Do 150-300 min vigorous physical activity or 300 â€“ 600 moderate physical activity per week.
Having plants in the home leads to a reduction of indoor pollutants.
A minimum of 2 hours a week spent in nature,increases your health and well being.
Avoid large meals, caffeine, and alcohol before bedtime.
A robust sense of well-being requires six hours a day of social interaction.
Try muscle relaxation, breathing or meditation exercises, prayer, yoga, or swimming to reduce stress.
Get between 10 and 30 minutes of sun exposure a few times a week.
Drink from glass bottles instead of plastic bottles to avoid toxic chemicals.
